text: Greenville is a city in South Carolina, United States. Bob Jones University is in Greenville. Greenville is in the Blue Ridge region of the state and is the county seat of Greenville County. As of 2020, there were 70,720 people living in the city, and 387,271 people living in the urban area. ==References== == Other websites == *Greenville website Category:County seats in South Carolina Category:1831 establishments in the United States Category:19th-century establishments in South Carolina
title: Greenville, South Carolina
